commit message: Implement delete functionality and remove unused drawables

Enable being selected in the share menu and provide vanity data
to the internal database. Furthermore, try to detect hints when
possible.
Fix privacy and sunset settings, the boundary comes after the form data

Implement the replace paste feature. Honestly, this
should also attempt to display the already existing
data to compare because of usability.
Rename the button IDs on UploadOptions' layout
Rearrange the id to make it properly refer to the builtin list ID

Implement a decent GUI for selecting paste hints.

Even though the syntax for supplying a url with a mimetype hint (.ext) or a highlighting hint (/language) is pretty simple, it's still pretty daunting to browse through all of the /language ones.

There's still a quirk where the 'no highlighting hints' message shows when the toggle switch is initially turned off.
Replace the menu item's icon for pruning with an actual broom, rather than a trash can. This is to make it explicitly clear that pruning is different from actual deleting.
Code style cleanup (remove snake casing wherever possible)
